component.text: Click Broadcast Multi-Access, Point-to-Point, or Non-Broadcast Multi-Access to view the topologies.
Click <font face='_typewriter'>debug eigrp packet</font>, and <font face='_typewriter'>debug eigrp fsm</font> to view the command ouput.
I need to see if EIGRP is sending update packets.
I need to see if all my successor and feasible successor routes are being discovered.
